snippet: The showdown between the authorities and Christopher J. Dorner, a former Los Angeles police officer accused of three killings, dominated the networks before the presidential address.
abstract: Television news coverage of impending State of the Union speech is overshadowed by standoff between authorities and former Los Angeles police officer Christopher J Dorner, who had barricaded himself in a cabin in California.
lead_paragraph: The showdown between the authorities and Christopher J. Dorner, a former Los Angeles police officer accused of three killings, dominated the networks before the presidential address.

headline.seo: Dorner Showdown Dominated Networks Before Speech
headline.main: Before Speech, News Focused on California
headline.print_headline: Before Speech, News Focused On California
